title: Heimerdinger Cupcakes!
body:
A while ago, one of the nicest ladies in the office (who always ensures that we get cake on our birthdays on my little team) had her birthday coming up.  So I secretly found out what her favorite flavor cake was, and who her main was and made Heimerdinger themed chocolate cupcakes!

{{champion:74}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:74}} 

The photo here shows how I went about making the 'Donger faces - you start with the garishly yellow hair in spikes, add the foofy white face-fur and glorious mustache, and then, if you have access to one, you add a 3d printed topper of his goggles!  If anyone wants the .stl I can probably find it and upload it!

(I hope the image linked ok - I'm not used to making threads.)

replies.body:
Awesome!

Where did you get access to the 3D printer?

> [{quoted}](name=Valkyrie Witch,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ZRMRzqpj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-05T08:41:24.304+0000)
>
> Awesome!
> 
> Where did you get access to the 3D printer?

I'm fortunate enough to own one - it's a 2.5yr old one now, so it's showing a bit of its age, but it gets the job done.  I know it's more usual for people to have access to one through a school or even a hackerspace these days, though.

Indeed. A wise choice. 


I just hope you made 42 of them.

> [{quoted}](name=lightdragoon88,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ZRMRzqpj,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-06-05T14:26:05.483+0000)
>
> Indeed. A wise choice. 
> 
> 
> I just hope you made 42 of them.

Can't.  Not.  Hear.  In.  His.  Voice!!

And dang - no that would have been a good idea.  I fear it was just 16 or so, as they were pretty work intensive.

Hey Bioluminescence,

I want a summoner icon/avatar icon that looks like that :D
Well she will like them....I hope.
Finally... I get to take him down!  Mwahahaha!!!
